title: EASY SUPERFOOD GRANOLA BARS
directions: In a medium bowl, combine toasted quinoa flakes, honey, pumpkin puree, tahini, cocoa powder, and sea salt.
Line a loaf pan or 8 X 8 pan (for thinner granola bars) with parchment paper.
Pour everything in a pan of your choice. Use your hand or spatula to pat the ingredients down.
Refrigerate granola bars in the refrigerator for 1 hour or so until it hardens. Alternatively, freeze granola bars for 30 minutes or so.
Cut them into squares or desired shape.
